content.body: Wait that's probably not right :D

(here's the crbug https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=594444#c16 though I'm still not sure if I'm misunderstanding the spec or browsers just all ignore the spec - probably the former)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: (here's the crbug https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=594444#c16 though I'm still not sure if I'm misunderstanding the spec or browsers just all ignore the spec - probably the former)

content.body: So, it turns out it just marks scripts with createElement with `async=true`, you can still mark them as async=false :D
content.formatted_body: So, it turns out it just marks scripts with createElement with async=true, you can still mark them as async=false :D
